title: Sound Completely Turns Off After Game Launches
body: My speakers completely stop working when I launch league of legends, I have pandora open, it's currently playing music but I can't hear it because when league launches a game all volume completely stops. Anyone know how to fix this?

replies.body:
This could be caused by a specific background application trying to access your sound device. You may be able to resolve this by [**performing a clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to temporarily disable your background applications from starting with your PC.

Let me know if this caused any change.
Didn't work unfortunately, any other ideas?

It could be a malfunctioning driver or an issue with your game assets. In order to troubleshoot this further, we'll need to look at some of your system logs, so I suggest we escalate this to our tech team. Run some logs using our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach the zipped logs to a [**support ticket.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

If you run into any issues, let me know!
